headline: JPMorganChase Declares Preferred Stock Dividends
summary: NEW YORK, August 15, 2025--JPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE: JPM) ("JPMorganChase" or the "Firm") has declared dividends on the outstanding shares of the Firm’s Series II and OO preferred stock. Information can be found on the Firm’s Investor Relations website at https://www.jpmorganchase.com/ir/news.

(NYSE: JPM) ("JPMorganChase" or the "Firm") has declared dividends on the outstanding shares of the Firm’s Series II and OO preferred stock.
